ygData.subject: Re: [rest-discuss] The proper thing to do with ESI: a custom hypermedia format?
ygData.msgSnippet: Further, no media type ends in +xhtml or +html .  If your media type may be processed via XML as a fallback for those components which don t understand your

Subject: Re: [rest-discuss] The proper thing to do with ESI: a custom
 hypermedia format?
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=266460716

Further, no media type ends in '+xhtml' or '+html'.  If your media type
may be processed via XML as a fallback for those components which don't
understand your media type, then the suffix is '+xml'.

-Eric
